* Vienna, Brad, and Katie go to the hospital for Vienna's insemination with Brad's sperm so that she can be their surrogate.  
* Luke decides to return to his foundation after a pep talk from his grandmother and a successful meeting with the Starglow foundation where Brian defends Luke's vision.
</summary>

<summary>
• Jennifer is pregnant and getting married to Mike.
• Alison broke up her friendship with Will after he secretly entered her apartment.
• Holden suspects Keith is a dangerous person and is after Lily's money.
• Celia told Alison about Will's secret entry to her apartment, causing a rift between Celia and Casey.
• Lily went to a dance with Keith and was seen by Holden and Jack.
• Keith is threatened by Vin who wants his money.
</summary>

<summary>
* Katie faints during the taping of her reality show and is rushed to the hospital. The doctor assures her that the baby is fine, but she needs to be on bed rest for the remainder of her pregnancy to avoid preeclampsia.
* Vienna fills in for Katie on the show and ends up becoming Brad's new co-host, much to Henry's dismay.
* Henry is upset with Vienna for spending so much time with Brad and worries about their "chemistry."
* Paul and Rosanna's car breaks down, and they are stranded with no money. They get help from a kind diner owner who gives them food and a place to stay for the night.
* Dusty and Bonnie are searching for Paul and the baby. Bonnie gets sick, forcing them to stop at a motel.
* Paul calls Rosanna and tells her to meet him alone or he will disappear with the baby forever. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Meg wants to give Paul more visitation rights with their daughter, Eliza, but Dusty strongly disagrees with her decision.
• Rosanna is staying with Paul at Fairwinds, and Carly is upset because she doesn't trust Paul and thinks Rosanna should be staying with her.
• Paul found out that Craig stole Rosanna's money and secretly transferred the money to a new account.
</summary>

<summary>
* Carly and Jack get married in a Native American ceremony.
* Before the wedding, Carly receives DNA test results about Sage.
* Jack gives Carly a necklace with their family's birthstones.
* Meanwhile, the search for Lily and Rose continues.
* Barbara helps by providing information about a hunting lodge.
* Rose manages to escape from the well.
* Holden and Dusty find Lily.
</summary>

<summary>
* Lily has a nightmare about Ethan's rescue where he appears lifeless after being brought out of the hole.
* Alison and Aaron return from their honeymoon to find out about Ethan's accident.
* Henry is held captive by Derek, who is working under the orders of James Stenbeck.
* Vienna and Bonnie are trapped in a warehouse after Derek leaves them there.
* Paul is revealed to be the one who went down the hole to help Ethan.
* Despite initial difficulties, Ethan is successfully rescued but needs to be hospitalized.
* Paul, however, gets trapped in the hole after another cave-in.
* James Stenbeck approaches Meg, offering to save Paul in exchange for custody of their unborn child.
* At the hospital, Ethan momentarily stops breathing but is revived by Chris.
* Henry, Vienna, and Bonnie reunite, discovering that James Stenbeck is behind their ordeal.
</summary>

<summary>
* Liberty spent the night at Paul and Emily's after an argument with Janet about the baby.
* Emily and Paul tell Liberty that she should move in with them until the baby is born.
* Janet is furious when she finds out and argues with both Liberty and Emily.
* Adam's hearing for the charges against him is approaching.
* Maddie agrees to testify for Adam, despite Casey's attempts to dissuade her.
* Casey convinces Maddie not to testify, but then changes his mind and asks her to go through with it.
* Maddie testifies, and the judge dismisses all charges against Adam.
* Adam decides to leave Oakdale, leaving a note for Margo and saying goodbye to Casey.
* Janet proposes to Jack that they raise Liberty's baby themselves.
* Alison breaks up with Casey after realizing the lengths he went to in order to get Adam out of town. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Carly receives bad news about her tumor and that the experimental treatment in Berlin won't work. Parker is having a hard time accepting this.
* Rosanna lied on the stand to protect Paul from Craig, but now Paul might find out the truth.
* Dusty is shot and left for dead by an Army Colonel named Winston Mayer. Sly finds him and agrees to get a message to Lily.
* Colonel Mayer apologizes to Holden and Luke for his behavior and accepts Noah for who he is. He even agrees to stay for a family dinner.
* Craig wants Meg to commit to their marriage fully and tells her it's him or Paul.
* Rosanna asks Craig to get Meg pregnant to keep her away from Paul.
* Sly confronts Colonel Mayer about shooting Dusty.
* Parker is convinced that Carly will be okay, despite the bad news about her tumor.
* Noah and Luke share a kiss, but worry about Colonel Mayer's reaction if he finds out.
* Paul finds out that Rosanna lied in court and is furious.
</summary>

<summary>
* Chris returns to Oakdale with his girlfriend, Emily, and clashes with his father, Bob, over a new research project.
* Chris wants to pursue a cutting-edge medical technology project led by Evan Walsh, but Bob deems it too risky.
* Carly, facing a terminal illness, convinces Jack to remarry her, much to the dismay of their son, Parker, and Jack's brother, Brad.
* Carly insists on a proper wedding ceremony and reception, despite Jack's desire to keep it small and private.
* Emma supports Carly's wishes and helps with the wedding preparations.
* Brad is angry with Carly for manipulating Jack and hurting Katie.
* Chris feels disrespected by Bob's lack of faith in his abilities and considers returning to Africa.
* Emily encourages Chris to stand his ground and work things out with his father.
* Jack and Carly meet with the minister, who questions their motives for getting remarried so quickly.
* Despite the challenges and doubts, Jack and Carly are determined to go through with the wedding. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Liam is anxiously waiting for Steffy to finalize her divorce from Wyatt so they can be together. He grows increasingly frustrated as she is late, doesn't answer his calls, and he fears she has changed her mind.
• Steffy is with Wyatt, finalizing their divorce. Wyatt is clearly heartbroken but wants Steffy to be happy. He even arranges for a doctor to remove their wedding tattoos.
• Quinn is feeling guilty about her encounter with Ridge in San Francisco and fears he will tell Eric, jeopardizing her marriage and place in the family.
• Ridge assures Quinn he won't say anything, as it would hurt Eric and damage his own standing within the family. They agree to forget the encounter and move forward with a newfound understanding.
• Steffy arrives at Liam's house, divorce papers in hand, just as Liam is about to leave on a jet to escape his heartache. They reunite, ecstatic to finally be free to be together. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Stephanie discovers that Rick and Steffy are secretly involved and confronts Rick about it. 
• She warns him that their relationship will be met with disapproval and resistance from their families. 
• Rick, however, is determined to pursue the relationship, believing their love is strong enough to overcome any obstacle. 
• Meanwhile, Bridget starts working for Jackie as a designer, adopting the persona of "Madame X" to keep her identity hidden. 
• Nick, unaware of Bridget's true identity, briefly interacts with her. 
• Steffy, worried about Stephanie's discovery, wants to tell Taylor about her relationship with Rick. 
• Taylor eventually finds out about Steffy and Rick's relationship and is shocked and angered.
</summary>

<summary>
• It's Nicole and Zende's wedding day. Nicole is getting ready with her mother, Maya, and Steffy.
• Zende is anxious but excited to marry Nicole. He's grateful for the support of his parents, Kristen and Tony.
• Julius, Nicole's father, is proud and happy for his daughter. He gives his blessing to Zende.
• Quinn is a bit jealous of the portrait of Nicole on the wall, as it's her usual spot in the house.
• Sally and Shirley try to crash the wedding with a poorly made cake, hoping for some publicity. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne has left Katie and asked for an annulment because he believes she is still in love with Bill.
• Bill is trying to be there for Katie and Will, offering support and advice.
• Bill has asked Wyatt to come back to work at Spencer, and Wyatt will only agree if Bill revives Spectra Fashions for Sally.
• Wyatt believes in Sally's talent and wants her to have the opportunity to shine as the head of her own fashion house. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Liam and Hope are frustrated because they have to wait six months to get married due to Liam's separation period from his marriage to Steffy. 
• Steffy is using this time to try to win Liam back, even going on a date with Rick. 
• Bill, Liam's father, doesn't think Hope is right for Liam and believes Liam should take this time to figure out what he really wants. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Nick wants to gain custody of his son, Jack, because he believes Taylor is unstable and unfit to care for him due to her drinking.
* Taylor, however, believes she is a good mother to Jack and that Nick is trying to take him away from her.
* Brooke, Jack's biological mother, supports Nick's decision, which causes further tension between her and Taylor.
* Rick, Brooke's son, surprisingly supports Taylor and promises to help her fight for custody of Jack.
* Nick hires Storm to be his lawyer for the custody hearing.
* Taylor is served with legal papers informing her of the emergency custody hearing.
* Felicia, Ridge's sister, is planning a big anniversary party for their parents and hopes it will lead to their reconciliation.
* Ridge is hesitant about the party, believing his father is happy with Donna and that his own relationship with Brooke is uncertain.
* Phoebe, Ridge and Taylor's daughter, is aware of the situation with Jack and her mother's struggles but is trying to focus on school.
* The episode ends with Taylor distraught over the custody battle and Rick comforting her, promising that he won't let Nick and Brooke take her son.
</summary>

<summary>
* Thomas is rushing his wedding to Zoe, which upsets Douglas, who sees Hope as his mother.
* Liam believes Thomas is manipulating the situation to make Hope jealous and ultimately win her back.
* Steffy discovers Thomas has two wedding gowns, one intended for Hope, confirming his ulterior motives.
* Despite Thomas's attempts to convince Steffy otherwise, she sees through his act and recognizes his desire to be with Hope. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Tensions rise between Rick and Ridge as Rick accuses Ridge of manipulating their family to get what he wants, including tricking Rick into leaving the family home so Ridge could move in with Caroline.
• Caroline goes into labor with Ridge and Thomas present. While Ridge supports Caroline, Rick expresses his resentment and predicts that Ridge's manipulative actions will eventually backfire. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Steffy and Liam are excited to be heading to Australia for their wedding, along with family and friends.
* Ridge and Brooke are also on the trip, planning to get married in Sydney.
* Quinn is nervous about attending the wedding as Eric's wife, worried about how she'll be received by the family.
* Sally is invited to the wedding by Thomas, who seems smitten with her.
* Despite not being able to afford it, Sally decides to go to Australia after some encouragement from Shirley and Darlita.
* Bill is suspicious of Ridge's intentions, believing he might still hurt Brooke.
* Katie observes Bill's lingering feelings for Brooke and his distrust of Ridge. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Katie is in the hospital with heart failure due to myocarditis, inflammation of the heart muscle.
* Katie's family is gathered at the hospital, including her sister Donna, husband Bill, and niece Hope.
* Taylor, Katie's therapist, arrives at the hospital and is suspicious of Bill and Brooke's involvement in Katie's condition.
* It is revealed that Katie had a confrontation with Brooke and Bill the day before, after which she took off her wedding ring.
* Flashbacks reveal that Bill was drinking heavily after an argument with Katie and got into a car accident with Brooke.
* Brooke hid Bill and his car at her house to protect him from a DUI scandal.
* Katie arrived at Brooke's house the next morning and saw Bill there, leading to a heated confrontation and Katie's departure.
* Donna suspects that there is more to the story than Brooke and Bill are letting on.
* Taylor notices a bump on Bill's head and becomes convinced that he was in an accident.
* Taylor vows to uncover the truth about what happened to Katie.
</summary>

<summary>
• The main storyline revolves around Steffy and Liam, a newly married couple expecting their first child.  Liam is excited about fatherhood and seeks advice from his own father, Bill. Meanwhile, Steffy is dealing with the emotional fallout of her marriage to Liam, which has deeply hurt Hope, Liam's ex-fiancée. 
• A major accident on the Pacific Coast Highway causes a traffic jam, preventing Steffy from returning home to Liam. This event leads to a significant conversation between Steffy and Hope, where Hope expresses her pain and anger but also her desire to move on and eventually find happiness for Steffy and Liam.
</summary>

<summary>
* Beth, struggling with memory loss, decides to return to Paris to spare her family the burden of her condition.
* Her daughters, Brooke and Katie, along with Stephen, try to convince her to stay, assuring her of their love and support.
* They believe that being surrounded by family will help Beth cope with her condition and potentially improve her memory.
* Meanwhile, Marcus reveals to Rick that he is Donna's son, making them cousins.
* Steffy observes the tension between Marcus and Ridge, who disapproves of Donna.
* Owen Knight, the private investigator who helped Marcus find his birth mother, appears, suggesting that Marcus owes his newfound fortune to him.
* Beth remains resolute in her decision to leave, believing that she will only become a burden to her family.
* However, after an emotional plea from her daughters and Stephen, Beth decides to stay, choosing to face her challenges with her family's love and support. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Brooke and Nick are stuck on Nick's boat in the fog.
* Deacon proposes to Macy.
* Rick tries to convince Sally that Deacon is a bad influence on Macy.
* Sally disagrees with Rick and supports Macy's relationship with Deacon.
* Nick and Brooke have dinner together on the boat and talk about their lives.
* Macy is hesitant to marry Deacon because she's worried about rushing into another relationship.
</summary>

<summary>
* Brooke decides to step down as the spokesmodel for her lingerie line, "Brooke's Bedroom," and offers the position to her sister, Donna.
* Brooke's decision is partly influenced by her husband, Nick, who believes she shouldn't be modeling lingerie while married.
* Ridge, Brooke's ex-husband and design partner, is unhappy with Brooke's decision and initially refuses to design for the line without her.
* Donna is both excited and nervous about taking on the role, especially without Ridge's support.
* Meanwhile, Bridget and Dante face relationship issues when a pregnancy test comes back negative, and Bridget admits to feeling relieved.
* Dante is frustrated by Bridget's hesitation towards starting a family and questions their future together.
* Felicia, Dante's ex-wife and mother of his child, sees this as an opportunity to rekindle their relationship.
* She reminds Dante of their past happiness and expresses her belief that he won't find true happiness with Bridget.
* Donna, aware of Ridge's feelings for Brooke, appeals to his emotional vulnerability and convinces him to continue designing the line.
* She positions herself as a supportive friend and confidante, hinting at a deeper connection with Ridge. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne and Ridge are called to their parents' house for a meeting to decide who will be in charge of Forrester.  Tensions are high between the brothers, with Ridge being confident and Thorne feeling insecure.
• Eric announces that he has made a decision, and someone will be leaving Forrester, but it won't be Thorne. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Thorne left Donna at the altar after Katie told him that Donna doesn't really love him and is only marrying him to get revenge at Stephanie.
* Donna is furious and vows to get revenge on Stephanie for turning Thorne against her. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Eric has awakened from his coma and is recovering at home with his family.
• Eric saw Donna in bed with Owen (her assistant) and is extremely upset.
• The Forresters (including Stephanie) are furious with Donna and believe she is to blame for the situation.
• The Forresters are preventing Donna from seeing Eric, claiming he doesn't want to see her.
• Stephanie is manipulating the situation to her advantage, hoping to reunite with Eric.
• Donna is determined to repair her marriage and believes Eric will forgive her.
• Taylor is struggling to cope with motherhood and fears losing Jack.
</summary>

<summary>
• Hope and Deacon reunite after her failed wedding to Liam. Deacon feels guilty for his past actions and wants to protect Hope.
• Liam throws himself into his work, trying to move on from Hope with Bill's encouragement. Bill believes Liam should embrace being a Spencer and forget about Hope.
• Thomas and Hope's modeling photos for Hope for the Future cause tension. Caroline is suspicious of Thomas' feelings for Hope, while Bill sees it as a sign that Liam should move on.
• Katie doesn't believe Hope has moved on from Liam and is concerned about Bill pushing his own agenda on their son. She goes to Forrester to check on Caroline and report back to Bill. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne's parents, Eric and Stephanie, give him the collection he designed as a peace offering and a way to show their pride in him. They encourage him to return to Forrester Creations.
• Ridge leaves town for a business trip after giving Thomas a stern warning to stay away from Amber.
• Caitlin informs Stephanie that Amber is working at the Insomnia cafe, which Thomas frequents, leading Stephanie to confront Amber. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Bill is unhappy about Liam's upcoming marriage to Hope, believing Hope doesn't appreciate Liam.
* Bill expresses his concerns to Liam, urging him to call off the engagement.
* Steffy, Liam's ex, agrees with Bill, believing Hope will always prioritize her career over Liam.
* Hope is excited about Liam's return from his bachelor party, unaware of his growing discontent.
* Bill, determined to end the engagement, asks Steffy to drive Liam home from the party.
* Bill hopes Steffy will rekindle her romance with Liam and convince him to leave Hope.
* Liam, upset with Hope for breaking her promise to move up the wedding, confides in Steffy.
* Steffy takes advantage of Liam's vulnerability, offering him comfort and support.
* Steffy encourages Liam to confront Hope and questions Hope's commitment to their relationship.
* The episode ends with Steffy's suggestion that she spend the night with Liam, leaving their future uncertain. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Bridget is pregnant with Nick's child, which puts their marriage in jeopardy as Nick is now married to Bridget's mother, Brooke.
• Nick is determined to make things work and believes Brooke will understand, given her unconventional life.
• Shane, a witness to Darla's death, continues to insert himself into the lives of Taylor and her daughters, causing concern for Stephanie and Hector.
• Stephanie, suspicious of Shane's motives, confronts him directly, seeking to neutralize the threat he poses.
• Jackie expresses her disappointment to Brooke about their decision not to have children, believing Nick secretly longs for a child of his own.
• Nick, about to reveal Bridget's pregnancy to Brooke, reassures her that their love will help them overcome any obstacle. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Katie had a successful kidney transplant.
• Flo was revealed to be Katie's kidney donor.
• The Logans are shocked and conflicted about Flo's actions.
• Brooke and Hope are still furious with Flo for her role in the baby swap and refuse to forgive her.
• Katie is grateful to Flo for saving her life.
• Shauna hopes that the Logans will forgive Flo, but Brooke firmly rejects this possibility.
• Wyatt and Sally are discussing their future and Sally's insecurities about Flo.
• Wyatt reassures Sally that he is committed to her.
• Douglas is adapting well to having Beth back in his life.
</summary>

<summary>
• Quinn physically attacked Katie after finding her in bed with Wyatt, leading to a heated argument with Eric who is furious about her violent behavior.
• Sheila, now a waitress, sees an opportunity to reunite with Eric as his marriage crumbles, manipulating both Pam and Mateo to get information and sow discord.
• Mateo, enjoying his role in the drama and attracted to Quinn, continues to provide Sheila with insider information about Eric and Quinn's deteriorating relationship. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Ridge, feeling guilty about bribing the judge, confides in Thorne about his actions and his worry about Bill's intentions towards Brooke.
* Bill, grateful to Brooke for helping him regain access to Will, expresses his gratitude and continues to pursue her romantically.
* Brooke, caught between her husband and Bill, assures Ridge of her love while struggling to navigate Bill's persistent advances.
* Pam, overjoyed after Charlie's proposal, desires to have their wedding at the Forrester mansion, much to Quinn's dismay.
* Quinn, uncomfortable with the idea of Stephanie's portrait being displayed at the wedding, tries to subtly dissuade Pam from her plans.
* Eric, supportive of Pam's wishes, agrees to host the wedding, setting the stage for potential conflict with Quinn. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Ridge is alive and back in Puerto Vista, reunited with Brooke, Nick, and Massimo.
• Ridge survived the furnace explosion thanks to Anna, who pulled him to safety.
• Stephanie arrives and witnesses Brooke's genuine grief over Ridge, leading to a truce between them.
• Deacon kicks Amber out of his house, believing it's best for Eric.
• Amber is devastated and feels like she's losing everyone in her life.
• Oscar comforts Amber and encourages her to focus on her job at Ozzz.
• Sally is furious about a competitor's advertising tactics.
• Darla arrives at Sally's office and is shocked by something she sees.
• Bridget supports both Deacon and Amber but acknowledges their relationship is complicated.
• Deacon regrets his past behavior and acknowledges Bridget's growth.
</summary>

<summary>
• Rick, the president of Forrester Creations, critiques a design by Ridge and Caroline, unaware of their whereabouts.
• Maya, suspicious of Caroline and Ridge's close working relationship, suggests they are involved romantically.
• Hope confronts her father, Deacon, about his relationship with Quinn, believing Quinn is manipulating him to gain access to her and her baby.
• Deacon, questioning Quinn's motives, wonders if she is using him to get closer to Hope.
• Wyatt tries to reassure Hope, suggesting they focus on their future as a family and not let their parents' actions affect them.
• Maya reveals to Rick that she saw Caroline in Ridge's arms, implying an intimate relationship beyond their design partnership.
</summary>

<summary>
* Bill is in the hospital after Ridge pushed him over a balcony. Bill claims he is not pressing charges because he wants to change his life and be a better person, but Ridge and Eric are skeptical, believing his motivation is to get back with Brooke.
* Ridge visits Bill in the hospital and accuses him of trying to come between him and Brooke. Bill argues that Ridge always lets Brooke down and he is the more stable and committed man.
* Eric warns Brooke that Bill might be trying to get back with her and that Ridge is concerned about their history. Brooke defends Bill, saying he is genuinely trying to change for his family.
* Pam is upset with Quinn for destroying Stephanie's portrait and for her condescending attitude towards their wedding. Quinn claims it was an accident and that she was going to have it repaired.
* Pam tries to take the portrait to get it fixed, but Quinn stops her, leading to an argument. Eric witnesses the fight and Pam, overwhelmed by Quinn's behavior, calls off the wedding.
* Justin arrives to take Bill home from the hospital. Ridge warns Bill to stay away from Brooke, but Bill is confident he will get what he wants. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Thomas is stressed because Hope's fashion line overshadowed his at the Forrester Creations show.
* Thomas has a plan to get the audience's attention, but he's keeping it a secret from everyone, including Brooke.
* Hope saved Oliver's job by exposing Amber's sabotage, and they believe their connection is destined.
* Despite the success of Hope's line, the audience is losing interest in Thomas's show.
* As Thomas is about to conclude his show, he brings out Brooke as a surprise, shocking the audience. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Thomas is missing, and Ridge is worried about him. He's been contacting Hope and Brooke, trying to find out where he is.
• Hope is secretly distraught because she believes she caused Thomas's death by pushing him into a vat of hydrofluoric acid.
• Brooke is urging Hope to keep quiet about the incident, assuring her that all evidence is gone.
• Ridge is concerned about Thomas's recent behavior, particularly his offer to trade custody of Douglas for sex with Hope and his subsequent pursuit of her through the Forrester building.
• Steffy and Quinn are also discussing Thomas's disappearance and his unusual decision to grant Hope joint custody of Douglas.
• Ridge blames himself for Thomas's problems, feeling he wasn't there enough for him as a father.
• Hope is struggling with the guilt of what she believes she did and is considering confessing.
• The final scene reveals that Thomas is alive, much to Hope's shock and relief.
</summary>

<summary>
• Stephanie is dying and Brooke is by her side. Stephanie gives Brooke her ring and asks her to sing her to sleep.
• Stephanie's family and friends reminisce about their relationships with her, expressing both love and gratitude for the impact she has had on their lives.
• Katie struggles with postpartum depression but ultimately finds the strength to bond with her son, Will. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Stephanie survives surgery after being shot but is heavily medicated and drifts in and out of consciousness. She repeatedly claims to Eric that Donna shot her.
* Eric confronts Donna, who denies shooting Stephanie. She claims they argued after the fashion show, she heard a noise, found Stephanie, and was turning her over when Stephanie regained consciousness.
* Ridge believes a member of Brooke's family shot Stephanie to protect Brooke from Stephanie's interference in her relationship with Ridge. Brooke vehemently denies this.
* Pam arrives at Eric's house, having heard about the shooting. She makes him dinner and essentially moves herself in to take care of him.
* While Stephanie is sedated, Donna sneaks into her hospital room and threatens her, insisting she keep quiet and stop accusing her.
* Donna attempts to convince Stephanie to help find the real shooter, claiming that if she didn't shoot Stephanie, and Stephanie didn't shoot herself, then Stephanie is still in danger. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Phoebe returns home from her singing tour with Constantine.
• She reveals to her mother, Taylor, that she was hurt by Taylor's relationship with Rick, her first love.
• Ridge is happy to have Phoebe back and asks her to sing at his rehearsal dinner with Brooke.
• Taylor is saddened by Ridge's wedding but agrees to move on if he promises to spend time with her and their children.
• Brooke tries to convince Rick to attend her wedding to Ridge, but he initially refuses, believing it's a mistake.
• Rick expresses his disapproval of the relationship, stating that Ridge will never make her happy.
• Brooke pleads with Rick, emphasizing her love for him and the importance of his presence at her wedding.
• Rick eventually agrees to attend the wedding to support his mother.
</summary>

<summary>
• Brooke wants to be a part of baby Jack's life, believing that their families are already intertwined and that Jack can bring them all together. However, Ridge is against the idea, worried about how Taylor would feel and concerned about Brooke's history with Nick.

• It is revealed that Brooke is Jack's biological mother due to a mix-up at the fertility clinic. Ridge confides in Ashley about the situation, leading to a discussion about the complexities and potential problems that could arise.

• Taylor decides to return to work soon, which surprises Nick, who assumed she would take more time off. They also discuss the upcoming christening and Nick's suggestion to invite Brooke, Ridge, and their children, an idea that Taylor strongly opposes.

• Felicia and Ashley discuss the situation, with Felicia expressing doubt about Brooke's ability to stay away from her biological son and the potential for complications as the children grow up and interact.

• Ridge confronts Brooke about confiding in Ashley and reiterates his stance against involving their family with Nick and Taylor's. He believes it's best for everyone to focus on their own families and move forward.

• Brooke and Nick meet secretly, both agreeing that Ridge and Taylor disapprove of Brooke's involvement with Jack. Brooke decides to cut off contact with Jack for the sake of her relationship with Ridge and the future they are building, despite the heartbreak it causes her.
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne expresses his feelings for Brooke and kisses her. He believes they should give their relationship another try.
• Ridge asks R.J. if he would like his guidance in the design business, hoping to recreate the bond he had with his own father.
• Quinn seeks Ivy and Simon's opinions on engagement ring options, ultimately favoring the emerald cut.
• Nicole returns from Paris and notices a close moment between Brooke and Thorne.
• Ridge shows Quinn the engagement ring he chose for Brooke, wanting to prove his commitment to her.
• Thorne criticizes Ridge's behavior, reminding Brooke of his past transgressions, particularly his kiss with Quinn.
• Brooke recounts the events in Australia, expressing her hurt and disappointment over Ridge's actions.
• Quinn assures Ridge that their past encounter is behind them and that Brooke will eventually forgive him.
• Thorne urges Brooke to reconsider marrying Ridge, believing it will only lead to more pain. He proposes to Brooke.
• Maya and Nicole discuss the potential consequences of a rivalry between Thorne and Ridge for Brooke's affections. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Nicole pleads with Brady to help her conceal the truth about her "fiancé" from Mia, the mother of the baby she wants to adopt. Brady reveals the truth to Mia, infuriating Nicole.  Nicole is desperate to keep Mia from backing out of the adoption.
* John agrees to undergo hypnosis to recover his memories, much to Marlena's relief, though she suspects his motivation might be related to his therapist, Charlotte.
* Chloe and Lucas prepare for their engagement party, but Chloe is plagued by guilt and Daniel confesses his love for her, urging her not to marry Lucas.
* Max and Chelsea discuss their New Year's Eve kiss and the status of their relationship. Max offers to be Chelsea's date to the engagement party, but she declines.
</summary>

<summary>
* Abigail's Aunt Adrienne saw her with EJ and thinks their friendship is suspicious, causing tension with Abigail's mother, Jennifer.
* EJ helped Gabi by convincing Abigail not to tell anyone about Nick being alive, saving Gabi, Kate, and Sami from potential legal trouble.
* Daniel's computer files, including evidence that could clear Eric, have been deleted, and he suspects the new cardiologist, Dr. Chyka.
* Dr. Chyka attacks and kidnaps Nicole at Daniel's apartment.
* Anne tries to get Daniel in trouble with the hospital by making false accusations and manipulating a witness. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Stefano offers to be Chad's silent partner in the coffeehouse venture, but Chad declines, wanting to succeed on his own.
* Kate proposes that Chad and Gabi become the new faces of Countess Wilhelmina, impressing her with their modeling chemistry.
* Hope contemplates Madison's offer to model for Mad World, prompting Bo to devise a plan to get Stefano to reveal information about the safe deposit box.
* Sami and Madison celebrate the success of their plan to sabotage Countess Wilhelmina from within, with Sami feeding Kate false information.
* Melanie confides in both Gabi and Chad about her father's sudden departure, leading to a charged moment between her and Chad.
* Bo and Hope trick Stefano into meeting them at the bank by having a bank employee inform him of a problem with the shared safe deposit box.
* Madison considers letting Brady and Will in on her and Sami's plan, acknowledging Sami's success in feeding Kate false information. 
</summary>

<summary>
• The most significant events in this episode of Days of Our Lives revolve around Sami and Lucas's wedding, Philip going off to war, and John's illness. 
• Sami is getting married to Lucas but is struggling with the reappearance of her ex, Brandon. Meanwhile, Kate is scheming to break them up. 
• Philip has left for war, and Belle is torn between her feelings for him and her love for Shawn. Jan is manipulating Belle to stay with Philip. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Sami successfully closes a deal in Chicago and decides to surprise EJ with the good news in person.
• JJ is anxious about his sentencing hearing and seeks advice from Kayla on forgiveness. He also worries about Theresa's influence on him.
• Theresa, struggling financially, manipulates a store clerk into giving her $2000 worth of gift cards under Abigail's name.
• Daniel and Nicole track down Chyka, but Daniel insists on proceeding cautiously to protect Nicole.
• Abigail confesses her guilt over her affair with EJ to him, while Nick tries to convince Sami that he has changed.
</summary>

<summary>
• Carly is trapped by Vivian in a soundproof basement. Vivian wants to kill Melanie as revenge for Carly killing Lawrence.
• Melanie is getting married to Philip. She is having second thoughts and tries to get a letter to Nathan, but he refuses to read it.
• Maggie is struggling with the anniversary of Mickey's death but ultimately decides to go to the wedding.
• Hope is suspicious of Vivian and tries to warn Bo, but he is unreachable.
• Chloe reveals to Daniel that she is pregnant.
• Vivian leaves the cannery, believing that Melanie will die soon, but refuses to tell Carly how. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Bo kicks Chelsea out of the house after finding out she helped Patrick.
• Chelsea is devastated and feels like she is not meant to be loved.
• Hope tries to convince Bo to give Chelsea another chance, but he refuses.
• Billie comforts Chelsea and tells her that Hope believes her.
</summary>

<summary>
• John threatened to kill Alex if he didn't stay away from Marlena.
• Lexie and Tek slept together again, and Abe almost caught them.
• Philip made a heartfelt speech at Shawn and Mimi's engagement party about how much he loves Belle and their daughter, Claire.
• Belle tried to tell Shawn that Claire is his daughter, but Philip interrupted them.
• Mimi decided to tell Shawn the truth about Claire's paternity by writing him a letter. 
</summary>

<summary>
• John expresses insecurity and distrust towards Marlena due to her connection with Tony, her ex-husband and the father of their twins, accusing her of having feelings for Tony and running to Roman for sympathy. Marlena denies these accusations, highlighting the importance of their children in maintaining a relationship with both men.

• Belle and Shawn-D reconcile and discuss their relationship, touching upon themes of jealousy, communication with parents about sex, and Belle's desire to be more spontaneous.  Their conversation is interspersed with a playful food fight.

• Rex confronts Rolf, his professor, about his true identity and his involvement in Rex and Cassie's conception. Rolf reveals that he facilitated their creation through in-vitro fertilization at Stefano DiMera's behest, aiming for "human perfection." Rex remains unfazed, revealing he has deduced Rolf's true identity and expressing anticipation for his own scientific project.
</summary>

<summary>
* At the hospital, Chelsea has lost consciousness and is undergoing tests.  Doctors Daniel and Lexie suspect complications from her surgery, but are waiting for results.  Kate and Nick are worried.
* Ava, holding several people hostage, reveals her plan to force Kayla to give up her baby as "payback" for Steve leaving her.  Meanwhile, Sami and E.J. argue over his representation of Nicole, with Sami accusing E.J. of being attracted to Nicole and using their son as leverage in the argument.
</summary>

<summary>
• Bo and Hope's children, Ciara and Theo, run away from home but are found safe and sound by Rafe, who tracked them down after deducing they might have stowed away on a delivery truck. 
• Nicole overhears Vivian talking about a prisoner the DiMeras kept in their basement and becomes convinced it was Rafe, leading her to believe EJ and Stefano are responsible for Rafe's changed personality.
• EJ tells Taylor he plans to divorce Nicole, claiming he's doing it for Nicole's own good so she can be with Brady, but Taylor believes he's only trying to justify his feelings for her.
• Stefano, wanting Chad to work for him at DiMera Enterprises, manipulates the situation with Abigail's help so Chad will accept the job offer.
• Bo insists Rafe stay in town to give an official statement about finding the children, delaying his leave of absence. Meanwhile, EJ and Taylor admit their love for each other.
</summary>

<summary>
• Jack has returned home, alive and well, much to the shock and delight of Jennifer and Abby. 
• Hope is wracked with guilt over the accident, believing she could have done more to help. 
• Bo and Billie are following a lead in their search for Georgia, which leads them to a deserted house. 
• While searching the house, they hear Georgia calling for Billie, but are then attacked by an unseen assailant. 
• Roman and Marlena return to Salem, much to the shock of Kate, who was under the impression they were both dead. 
• John is overjoyed to be reunited with Marlena, but is confused about how she survived. 
• Kate is stunned to see Roman alive, as she believed he was dead as well. 
• Belle and Mimi are worried about Shawn, Rex, Brady, and Lucas, who are on a mission to rescue Philip. 
• Belle is upset with Kate for moving on with John so quickly after Sami's death and for her hypocritical attitude towards relationships. 
• Hope is frustrated with Bo for disappearing with Billie again and questions why men are so drawn to her. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Sonny hires Paul to investigate Deimos' whereabouts.
* Paul discovers Deimos flew to Manitoba, Canada, with Lyle, a Titan employee.
* Sonny pressures Lyle into revealing Deimos' motive: to take Brady, Nicole, and Holly.
* Brady and Nicole enjoy a peaceful evening until a masked intruder arrives.
* The intruder shoots Brady and reveals himself to be Xander.
* Tripp struggles to accept Steve due to Ava's death, leaving dinner early.
* Kayla remains optimistic about Tripp eventually bonding with Steve.
* Jade acts suspiciously while discussing Ava's death with Tripp. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Roman is looking for Kate, who has gone on a sudden business trip and doesn't want to be contacted.
* At the Dimera mansion, Cassie throws a party where Shawn-D's drink is spiked with poison by Vin Ramsell.
* Bo and Hope arrive to investigate, and Chaz is taken into custody.
* The poison is revealed to be cocaine laced with arsenic, and Bo vows to find Ramsell.
* Meanwhile, Sami and Lucas are trapped in her apartment due to what they believe is a murderer on the fire escape, but it turns out to be wind chimes.
* Rex reveals to Mimi that he has finished school early and is intellectually advanced, which both excites and scares her.
* John and Marlena argue with Tony about his parenting skills, while Belle expresses frustration with Cassie's behavior.
* Bo convinces Chaz to cooperate with the investigation, but Ramsell remains at large. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Daniel and Jennifer return to work after their night together, but their attempts at being discreet are thwarted by Anne, who is determined to make their lives miserable. 

* Anne's behavior is revealed to be a result of her involvement in Chloe's schemes against Jennifer, and Daniel threatens to expose her if she doesn't back off.

* John's anger and frustration over Brady and Kristen's upcoming wedding lead to a confrontation with Roman, where John ultimately tells Roman to take care of Marlena.

*  John confides in Nicole about his feelings of helplessness and hints at his desire to take drastic measures to stop the wedding.

*  Kristen attempts to seduce Brady, but he surprises her with adoption papers, expressing his desire to start a family with her.

*  Eric grapples with Kristen's accusations about Marlena's past actions and their impact on their family. He ultimately tells Kristen he won't be attending the wedding.

*  Victor advises Marlena to walk away from John and accept that she has lost him, warning her that things will only get worse.

*  Stefano remains cryptic about his knowledge of Kristen's true intentions, while EJ expresses his concerns about Kristen joining the Kiriakis family.
</summary>

<summary>
* Kate tells Lucas that Jordan left town after she told her that she broke into her apartment.
* Lucas is angry with Kate for using Sheryl and driving Jordan away.
* Rafe is angry with Jordan for not telling him that she was leaving town.
* Jordan tells Rafe that she loves him and agrees to stay in Salem.
* Will is upset about the custody agreement and doesn't want Gabi to go to prison.
* Sonny tells Will that he got a gun and was planning to kill Nick.
* Nick tells Julie that he feels like everyone hates him and that he wants to change.
* Julie tells Nick to call Marlena for help.
* Nick calls Marlena and is shot.
</summary>

<summary>
• It's the day of Marlena's funeral, and emotions are running high. 
• Sami is distraught and blames John, Kate, and Bo for Marlena's death.
• Belle is heartbroken and misses her mother dearly, wishing Shawn were there for her.
• Hope is concerned because she hasn't heard from Shawn either.
• John is devastated and struggles with the fact that Marlena died before her name was cleared.
• Celeste believes Marlena's spirit is restless and tries to convince John that Marlena doesn't want to be buried.
• Meanwhile, Nicole is desperately trying to get money from Jan to bail out Crystal, who threatens to expose Nicole's involvement in Marlena's death.
• Jan is holding Shawn captive in a remote location, keeping him drugged and manipulating him into believing they are in love.
• At the funeral, Sami hears Marlena's voice coming from the casket, leaving her terrified.
</summary>

<summary>
• John's warehouse burned down, and he suspects Philip is behind it. 
• Philip denies any involvement in the fire but is clearly shaken by the news.
• Max confesses to Nick that he has a gift for understanding complex concepts but is afraid to embrace it.
• Max threatens Dean Robbins, telling him he'll expose him if he doesn't let Nick continue his research.
• It is revealed that Philip hired someone to take care of a problem, and it is implied that this problem was the fire.
</summary>

<summary>
* Chloe and Daniel are getting married at the hospital.
* Chloe doesn't want to wait any longer to get married.
* Daniel's friend Kevin, a justice of the peace, is performing the ceremony.
* Carly shows up at the hospital as the ceremony is about to begin.
* Alice Horton is close to death and her family is gathering to say goodbye.
* Will is living with Stefano and Kate, which Alice disapproves of.
* Madeline tries to convince Chad to go to college out of state, but he decides to stay in Salem.
</summary>

<summary>
* Hope and Aiden are going on a romantic getaway to the Green Mountain Lodge.
* Chase has been transferred to a private psychiatric hospital.
* Ciara has been offered a volunteer position at Shady Hills, the same institution where Abigail is being treated.
* Abigail is fearful of being transferred to a state asylum.
* Chad is secretly planning to break Abigail out of Shady Hills.
* Rafe is struggling with Hope's decision to go away with Aiden.
* Monahan has confessed to killing Stefano DiMera.
</summary>

<summary>
* EJ asks Abe to officiate his and Sami's wedding, and Sami asks Abigail to be her maid of honor.
* Abigail is overwhelmed with planning the wedding and worried about Sami's expectations.
* Paige's mom, Eve, arrives in Salem earlier than expected and meets JJ.
* Paige is worried about Eve's reaction to JJ's past legal troubles.
* Eve is initially wary of JJ but agrees to give him a chance.
* Rafe is struggling with guilt over Gabi's situation and pushes Jordan away.
* Kate encourages Jordan to be there for Rafe and not give up on their relationship.
* Jennifer invites Eve to dinner at the Deveraux house, much to JJ's dismay.
* Eve is shocked to learn that JJ's last name is Deveraux. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Xander holds Ted captive and plans to kill him for discovering that Holly is alive and that Nicole is hiding it.
• Ted convinces Xander to spare his life by offering him a valuable necklace to give to Sarah.
• Sami confronts Nicole, believing she is hiding something more than just a scar on her neck.
• Brady tries to convince Nicole to work for Titan instead of Dimera, but she declines.
• Nicole denies knowing anything about Ted's whereabouts when Brady mentions Hope is looking for him.
• Rex and Sarah ask Eric to officiate their wedding, which they decide to have immediately.
• Victor worries about Nicole's intentions towards Brady and asks Kate to investigate.
• Sami remains suspicious of Nicole and feels she is hiding something significant. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Hope is struggling to accept Marlena's professional opinion that Ben is mentally fit and not responsible for the fire at the cabin.
* Ben visits Ciara to convince her he didn't set the fire, leading to tension with Tripp.
* Lani receives a death certificate for her son, David, triggering her grief and leading to a tense encounter with Eli.
* Chad confides in Marlena about his struggles accepting Abigail's pregnancy with Stefan's child.
* Abigail experiences the baby kicking for the first time, leading to a brief moment of connection with Stefan.
* Rafe suggests closing the investigation into the cabin fire, much to Hope's dismay.
* Gabi grapples with guilt over her actions and questions her own morality. 
</summary>

<summary>
• The story begins with Marlena and John's wedding being interrupted by Sami, who believes her mother is in danger.
• Sami's outburst is initially dismissed as drunken rambling, but she insists that someone is trying to kill Marlena.
• The situation escalates when Kristen DiMera reveals herself, holding Marlena hostage at gunpoint.
• Meanwhile, Will experiences a flood of memories, including his wedding to Sonny and significant moments with his family.
• Kristen claims responsibility for Susan's erratic behavior and reveals her plan to kill Marlena as revenge for pushing her out of a window.
• The tension rises as Kristen forces Sami to choose between killing John or never seeing EJ again, who Kristen claims is alive.
• The episode ends on a cliffhanger with Kristen urging Sami to shoot John while everyone pleads with her not to. 
</summary>

<summary>
• JJ tells Jennifer that Paige knows he is undercover for the DEA.
• Eve tells Kyle that JJ is working with the cops.
• Will is upset with Paul because he believes Paul is the reason Sonny left.
• Caroline agrees to help with the bicentennial celebration.
• Eve warns Paige that Kyle is dangerous and that she should stay away from him and JJ.
• Kyle asks JJ to sample his new shipment of meth.
• Aiden thanks Hope for including him in her life and tells her he has a surprise for her.
• Ben and Abigail celebrate their anniversary.
• Adrienne tells Lucas that she wants to move on with her life and date him.
• Eve and Justin run into each other at the Brady Pub.
</summary>

<summary>
* Will is waiting for news about his grandmother, Kate, who is in critical condition after being shot.
* Vivian, Kate's attacker, is revealed to be alive and wants to ensure Kate doesn't expose her.
* Eve, seeking revenge on Jack, sabotages Rolf's lab where he was developing a serum to restore Jack's memory.
* Brady, struggling with his feelings for Kristen, goes to her and almost gives in to her advances.
* Kristen, believing Brady wants her as much as she wants him, is enraged when he rejects her and accidentally cuts herself on broken glass.
* Nicole, wanting a divorce from Xander, is shocked to learn he has feelings for Sarah.
* Xander, despite knowing Sarah loves Eric, believes he might have a chance with her now that Eric and Nicole are reunited.
* Sarah, heartbroken but understanding, accepts that Eric is in love with Nicole and wishes them happiness.
* Eric and Nicole, finally reunited, look forward to spending their first night together.
* Will and Sonny, frustrated by the lack of information, search for someone who can give them an update on Kate's condition. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Orpheus shot JJ while Gabi was on the phone with him. 
• Marlena had to perform an emergency procedure to help JJ breathe.
• Orpheus took John hostage, but Steve and John were able to overpower him.
• Anne showed up at the DiMera mansion after being kicked out of her mother's house and got into an argument with Lucas.
• Justin fainted after rushing to the hospital, thinking Adrienne was in danger.
• Adrienne and Justin had a heart-to-heart and agreed to be friends.
• Kayla informed Jennifer, Adrienne, and Justin that JJ was in a coma after surgery.
• Gabi told JJ in his hospital room that she would never take him for granted again.
• Orpheus injected himself with a sedative from Marlena's bag and died.
</summary>

<summary>
* Eve tells Victor and Brady that Deimos left her controlling interest in Basic Black, and that Titan is obligated to pay 80% of its operating costs.
* Brady is furious and wants to get rid of Eve, but Victor tasks him with the job while also relieving him of his CEO duties at Titan.
* Victor believes Brady has started drinking again and tells him he needs to get his act together.
* Eli proves to be a very competent detective, irritating Rafe who tries to assert his authority.
* Eli calls Rafe out for projecting his insecurities about Hope being his superior.
* Kate offers to buy Gabi Chic and make Gabi a part of Countess Wilhelmina.
* Gabi is hesitant because of Chad, but Kate assures her she would be reporting directly to her.
* Abigail tells Gabi that she is returning to Dimera as the head of PR.
* Jennifer and Eric have a heart-to-heart about supporting each other and moving on from Nicole.
* Brady tells Rafe and Eli that he knows who killed Deimos and points to Eve. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Paul is leaving Salem to go to an experimental program in San Francisco that could help him walk again.
• Paul's mom told him about the program a few weeks ago, but he dismissed it because he didn't want to be separated from Will.
• Paul decided to go to the program after Will broke up with him to get back together with Sonny.
• Will is trying to find Sonny, who left town after Will told him that he was going to stay with Paul.
• Tripp confessed to Ciara that he framed Ben for setting the fire.
• Ciara is furious with Tripp for lying to her and framing Ben.
• Tripp and Ciara break up.
• Valerie has been offered the position of Chief of Staff at her old hospital in D.C. and wants Abe to move with her.
• Abe doesn't want to move to D.C., and he and Valerie get into a fight about it.
</summary>

<summary>
•  Theo is suspicious of Valerie and tries to convince Claire and Ciara that she is lying to Abe.  They plan to do some online research on her.
•  Steve and Paul discover that Eduardo is shipping counterfeit designer handbags and are unsure if they should tell Sonny.
</summary>

<summary>
• It's New Year's Eve in Salem and everyone is getting ready to celebrate. 
• Vivian is plotting revenge on Carly and trying to find out who her secret child is. 
• Carly confesses to Daniel that she killed Lawrence. 
• Melanie and Philip are eloping to Las Vegas to get married. 
• Nathan tries to stop the wedding because he still has feelings for Melanie. 
• Hope and Justin search for documents that contain information about Carly's secret. 
</summary>

<summary>
• The episode features multiple storylines, including Luke recovering from a heart attack, Alexis and Diane both being nominated for "Litigator of the Year," and Sonny being arrested in New York City.
• Ric attempts to take advantage of Sonny's arrest to broker a deal with the Zaccharas, while Jason struggles to locate Sonny and Carly worries about his well-being.
• Jerry Jacks orders a hit on Stanford, Epiphany's son, who is working for him in Florida. The episode ends with Luke's heart monitor flatlining. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Sonny shot Dominic, who is actually his son, Dante. Olivia, Dante's mother, had kept Dante's paternity a secret from Sonny to protect him.
• Dante was critically injured and taken to the hospital. Sonny called Robin and Patrick to operate on him.
• Josslyn's christening was a success, and Carly and Jax hosted a reception at their home.
• Lulu is worried because she hasn't heard from Dominic, and she has a bad feeling.
</summary>

<summary>
• Claudia offers Sonny a truce through Jason, proposing to give up information about Trevor in exchange for Sonny calling off the vendetta against Johnny.
• Sonny, enraged by Michael's disappearance, refuses the deal, leaving Johnny trapped in the abandoned psychiatric clinic.
• Diego, after escaping the hospital, reveals to a captive Sam that he was the Text Message Killer and plans to blow up the warehouse.
• He forces Sam to move with him, intending to stage her death as a convincing suicide.
• Nikolas, guided by Emily's spirit, relives the night of her murder and finally remembers Diego as the killer.
• Maxie discovers a clue left by Coop, potentially leading to the Text Message Killer's identity.
• Monica encourages Epiphany to embrace her role as a survivor and advocate for heart health awareness.
• Lucky advises Lulu to navigate her complicated feelings for Johnny cautiously, drawing parallels to his own experiences with love and loss. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Lucky finds Johnny with an injured leg and suspects him of trying to break into Sonny's consigliore's office while wearing a Clinton mask. 
• Lucky warns Johnny about Sonny's dangerous nature and urges him to tone down his actions to avoid a mob war.
• Jason is informed about Johnny's defiance and feels pressured to retaliate, but Lucky pleads with him to stall for the sake of their families.
• Luke, concerned about Ethan's involvement with Johnny, asks Sonny to ensure Ethan's safety, to which Sonny agrees.
• Michael struggles with guilt over Claudia's death and the impact it's having on his family, particularly Sonny's upcoming trial.
• Carly tries to reassure Michael that their lies will hold up in court and that Sonny won't face serious consequences.
• Dante and Claire discuss the weaknesses of their case against Sonny and consider calling Michael as a witness, despite Dante's objections.
• Alexis starts working in Diane's office while it's being renovated, leading to humorous clashes over their work styles and Diane's relationship with Max.
• Elizabeth, pregnant and unsure of the father's identity, decides to raise her children independently, but Steve advises her to consider accepting help from the father.
• Spinelli, investigating a case for a chef's wife, stumbles upon a possible serial killer and enlists Maxie's help in solving the mystery.
</summary>

<summary>
• Todd Manning, arrested for the murder of his brother, is brought to Port Charles. He blames Sonny Corinthos for the death of his granddaughter and her father, believing Sonny caused the car accident that killed them.
• Starr, Cole's girlfriend, confronts Sonny, blaming him for the accident. She reveals that the other driver, Anthony Zacchara, told her Sonny shot out his tires, causing the crash.
• Meanwhile, Johnny is caught between Kate and Connie, with Anthony encouraging him to sleep with Kate to destroy Sonny.
• John McBain, the police officer who brings Todd in, warns Sonny that he will be watching him closely and will take him down if he finds evidence of Sonny's involvement in the accident. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Olivia Jerome, Julian's sister who was presumed dead, is revealed to be alive and responsible for the car bombing that killed Morgan. She kidnaps Alexis and forces Julian to shoot her, but it's unclear who gets shot.
* Curtis and Jason successfully disarm the bomb at the hospital, saving everyone inside.  Carly vows to make Olivia pay for Morgan's death.
</summary>

<summary>
* Michael is furious that Brandon, the man who assaulted Abby, is out on bail and threatens to harm him if he goes near her again. Abby is hesitant to testify, fearing it will send Michael back to prison, but Michael is determined to ensure Brandon faces consequences.
* Luke is consumed by guilt over accidentally killing Jake, especially as Lucky and others believe his drinking was a factor. Sonny tries to convince Luke, Lucky, and Jason that it was a tragic accident, but their grief and anger are intense. Elizabeth also blames herself for not watching Jake closely enough.
* Brenda attempts to make peace with Carly for the sake of the children, but Carly refuses to allow Brenda near them.  Theo discovers Suzanne has been hiding his grandson, but she reveals the child and suggests they raise him together without Brenda's knowledge.
</summary>

<summary>
* The main plot revolves around Jax and Carly's custody battle over their daughter Josslyn. Jax uses Shawn's past against him to force him to quit protecting Josslyn, leading Carly to convince Shawn to stay. 
* Meanwhile, Brenda struggles to connect with her son Alec while navigating her marriage to Sonny, who is dealing with his own guilt and the fear of putting Alec in danger. 
</summary>

<summary>
* The police are investigating Nikolas' disappearance and suspect Jason is involved.  Nikolas is presumed dead, but Jason believes he staged the incident to escape someone or something.
* Lucas is recovering from being attacked at the hospital and can only recall his assailant was wearing a white lab coat. Dr. Obrecht accuses Finn of being a drug addict and responsible for Lucas' attack and the death of two patients.
* Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot Claudette's lover years ago. Maxie is upset that Nathan kept this secret from her and unsure if she can still marry him. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Nikolas breaks up with Rebecca, unable to reconcile his feelings for her with her resemblance to her deceased twin sister, Emily. 
* Michael, recovering from a gunshot wound, clashes with Carly over his desire for independence.
* Olivia finds herself in a complicated situation as her casual relationship with Johnny Zacchara attracts Sonny's ire.
* Andrea, the mayor's wife, attempts to persuade Patrick to settle a malpractice lawsuit out of court to protect her husband's reputation and political career.
* Claudia confides in Johnny about her plan to eliminate Jason, fearing he will uncover her role in Michael's shooting.
* Sonny, suspicious of Johnny's intentions towards Olivia, instructs Jason to keep a close eye on him.
* Michael, defying his parents' wishes, sneaks out to a bar and encounters Johnny, leading to a tense exchange.
* Jax surprises Carly with a romantic evening, providing a temporary respite from the family drama.
</summary>

<summary>
• Maxie is dying from a failing heart transplant. Georgie, her sister, wakes up from surgery and wants to see her before it's too late.
• Ric is questioned by both the police and Jason about the death of Reese's ex-husband. Reese reveals to Ric that she knew Carly in high school and was jealous of her life. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Patrick and Robin argue about whether or not Robin is pregnant and what Patrick's role would be if she is. Patrick takes care of Jake for the day and discovers he's a natural.
* Carly experiences symptoms that could indicate pregnancy, but she's resistant to take a test because she's afraid of the possibility of being pregnant so soon after Michael's accident. She later reveals to Morgan that the potential father could be either Jax or Sonny.
* Kate and Sonny discuss a prenuptial agreement. Kate is concerned about protecting her assets from any legal trouble Sonny might encounter due to his past.
* Maxie and Johnny are stuck in an elevator together. Maxie flirts with Johnny and tries to convince him that Lulu is bad for him. Lulu witnesses this and confronts Maxie.
* Logan tries to convince Lulu that Johnny and his family are bad news. He gets into a fight with Johnny and is arrested.
* Spinelli gets sick and starts making cryptic pronouncements about Jason and Sonny. Claudia takes care of both men and seems to believe Spinelli's warnings.
</summary>

<summary>
• Lulu reveals to Laura and Nikolas that she is having a baby girl but also that Stavros had Nikolas shot to punish Lulu for refusing to sleep with him.
• Carly agrees to let Morgan stay at the house with Kiki after Franco blackmails her, but she doesn't believe his claims of innocence and suspects Ava is involved.
• Shawn agrees to quit working for Sonny to save his relationship with Alexis after she gives him an ultimatum.
• Luke leaves Tracy a note explaining that he has to face Jerry alone and doesn't want to put her at risk.
</summary>

<summary>
• Patrick accidentally pricks himself with a needle while operating on an AIDS patient and has to get tested for HIV.
• Sonny has a difficult therapy session where his therapist suggests his mother is to blame for the abuse he suffered as a child.
• Sonny argues with both Emily and Carly about his mother's culpability in the abuse.
• Carly believes Adela should have done more to protect Sonny from his stepfather.
• Nikolas and Emily spend time together caring for baby John.
• Colleen, hoping to reunite with Nikolas, worries Emily is a danger to John.
• Lucky learns that the bullet he fired at Manny missed, meaning Jason was ultimately the one who killed him.
• Sam and Jason get trapped in an elevator together, where Jason helps Sam study for her GED.
</summary>

<summary>
• Sam is awaiting test results to see if she contracted malaria from Jason, who may have been exposed in Greece. She is also experiencing symptoms like lightheadedness and fainting spells.
• Sam discovers she is pregnant but worries about the effects of malaria on the baby. She asks Elizabeth to keep it a secret from Jason until she knows more.
• Kevin and Laura receive good news: their malaria tests are negative.
• Lucy visits Kevin at the hospital and realizes he has feelings for Laura.
• Ava runs into Laura at the hospital and shares a comforting lie about Nikolas dying a hero to save her.
• Julian is visited by Alexis in prison. He asks her to lie to the Bar Association to save her career in exchange for his freedom, but she refuses.
• Julian is unexpectedly released from prison with the help of Holt.
• Kristina confides in Alexis about her relationship with Aaron and her unanswered messages to Parker. Alexis's words make Kristina suspicious.
• Jordan gives André a key to her apartment, but he hesitates to accept it, feeling it's too big of a step in their relationship.
• Sam receives a call from Dr. Finn asking her to come in, likely about her test results. Elizabeth drives her to the hospital.
</summary>

<summary>
• Sonny comforts Alexis and Kristina after Alexis experiences a health scare, but suspects she's hiding something more serious.  He later encourages her to be honest with Ric about her needs.
• Lucky is struggling with addiction and confesses to Nikolas and Emily that Elizabeth left him after discovering his affair with Maxie.
• Elizabeth seeks solace with Jason, revealing Lucky's infidelity and her own past feelings for Jason.  They end up sleeping together.
• Nikolas and Emily are frustrated with Lucky's self-destructive behavior and refusal to take responsibility.
• Lulu decides to leave Port Charles, partly to escape the drama and partly to search for her father, Luke.
• Dillon is supportive of Lulu but makes it clear he's not ready for a serious relationship with her.
• Sam regrets sleeping with Ric and plans to tell Jason, believing Ric will use the information against them.  Ric tries to dissuade her.
• Ric confesses his affair with Sam to Sonny, claiming it was motivated by revenge against Jason. Sonny urges Ric to focus on his family.
• Jason and Elizabeth reminisce about their past connection and acknowledge the obstacles that have kept them apart.
• Alexis and Ric's marriage is strained due to a lack of loyalty and communication.
</summary>

<summary>
• It's Carly and Sonny's wedding day.
• Carly is worried about her sons, Michael and Morgan.
• Michael is struggling to forgive Sonny for killing AJ and is unsure about attending the wedding.
• Morgan is dealing with the fallout of his breakup with Kiki and the revelation that Ava is Denise.
• Sonny reveals to Morgan that he is bipolar and suspects Morgan might be as well.
• TJ messes up Sonny and Carly's wedding cake but Molly helps him fix it.
• Spencer is determined to win back Emma and believes Nikolas and Hayden should be a couple.
• Anna returns to Port Charles and helps Sam with her investigation into Nikolas.
• Anna reveals that Nikolas rigged the mayoral election with Kyle Sloane's help.
• Sam and Anna plan to get proof of Nikolas's wrongdoing from Sloane.
</summary>

<summary>
* It's Carly and Sonny's wedding day, but Sonny is nowhere to be found. Carly remains optimistic, believing he's preparing a surprise.
*  Sonny is revealed to have been shot by Charlie and is in critical condition. Jason and Sam are with him as paramedics fight to save his life.
* Anna breaks things off with Sloane after learning he's been working for Nikolas and withheld information about election tampering. Sloane threatens to expose Anna's past crime if she doesn't secure him immunity.
*  Hayden continues to question Nikolas about Jake's identity, convinced Nikolas knows more than he's letting on. Their conversation is constantly interrupted, leaving the mystery unsolved. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Franco is a free man after the judge ruled that his brain tumor was responsible for his past crimes.
• Sonny is grieving Connie's death and blames himself for her demise. He almost attempts suicide but is found by Olivia, Dante, Michael, and Morgan.
• Britt gives birth to a baby boy with Sabrina's help. The baby has breathing complications but is taken to the hospital just in time and recovers.
• Brad reveals to Felix that he is the baby's sperm donor. Felix notices that the baby doesn't look like Brad.
• Kiki learns about Franco's exoneration and goes to see him. Michael tells Kiki that Morgan truly loves her and that she is now family.
• Carly confronts Franco about his supposed feelings for her. Franco claims he needs her to believe in him. Tracy kicks Ava out of the Quartermaine mansion.
</summary>

<summary>
• Jerry Jacks, suffering from radiation poisoning, holds Alexis hostage on his boat, demanding $88 million for a cure and rigging the antiserum for the pathogen with a bomb.
• John McBain and Dante attempt to defuse the bomb, with Lulu's help, while Sonny and Shawn go after Jerry.
• Tracy Quartermaine steals the only dose of antiserum from the hospital to give to her father, Edward, but he insists that it be given to Emma Drake instead.
• In a final confrontation, Jax tries to reason with Jerry, but Sonny arrives and shoots Jerry dead before he can detonate the bomb or shoot Jax. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Morgan is out to kill Julian, believing that Julian shot Sonny.
* Morgan has acquired a gun and is searching for Julian.
* Michael is trying to find Morgan before he can hurt Julian.
* Alexis has rented a cabin for Julian to hide out in.
* It is Patrick's birthday and Sam, Emma, Anna, and Danny throw him a surprise party.
* Dillon's movie is shut down due to a permit issue, but Paul is able to smooth things over with the mayor.
* Ava's flash drive with the recording of her confession has gone missing from Scott's room.
</summary>

<summary>
* It's Sonny and Kate's wedding day, but things are not going as planned. 
* Olivia is convinced that "Kate" is actually Connie, her alternate personality, and tries to warn Sonny.
* Kristina is kidnapped by Joe Jr., Trey's father, who plans to kill her and frame Sonny for her death.
* Elizabeth reveals to Jason that she switched Sam's baby's DNA test results and that Sam's baby is alive.
* Jason tells John that Sam's baby is alive and they need to tell Téa.
* Elizabeth tells Sam that she lied about being with Jason and that he still loves her.
* At the wedding, "Kate" objects to the marriage, revealing that she is already married.
* "Kate" announces that she is married to Johnny.
</summary>

<summary>
* Sonny agrees to take over the Zacchara organization, but only if he can be in charge and if he marries Claudia.  Many people, including Sonny's brother Ric, Claudia's brother Johnny, and Sonny's enforcer Jason, believe this is a bad idea.
* Jax buys most of Spoon Island out from under Nikolas in retaliation for Nikolas buying into the Metro Court.  Carly believes this is a bad idea and tries to get them to reconcile, but Jax refuses.  Meanwhile, Elizabeth, Sam, and the boys are in danger as the Russians have found them at the cabin.
</summary>

<summary>
• Jason visits Franco's studio after finding clues in a painting Franco gave him. Sam is worried that Franco is setting a trap for Jason.
• Franco is obsessed with Jason and has been trying to get his attention.
• Carly wants to tell the police the truth about Claudia's death, but Sonny is worried about the consequences for Michael.
• Michael is struggling to cope with killing Claudia and Sonny wants him to move back in with him.
• Olivia admits to Johnny that she is in love with Sonny.
• Rebecca tells Ethan that Nikolas ran her over with his car.
• Ethan doesn't believe Nikolas's claim that it was an accident.
• Maxie is more concerned with covering up her night with Franco than she is with Jason's safety.
</summary>

<summary>
• Franco confessed to Kevin that he killed Heather to protect Carly and buried the body in a pre-dug grave. Kevin agreed to be Franco's therapist.
• Maxie encouraged Spinelli to move to Portland with Ellie and the baby, believing it's best for everyone involved.
• Lulu blamed Dante for losing custody of their baby and was heartbroken. Carly encouraged her to forgive Dante and grieve with him.
• Dante suggested to Lulu that they try to have another baby to heal from the loss of their daughter. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Alexis wants to cut down a Christmas tree in the woods as a family tradition, but Ric resists, preferring a tree lot.  Alexis eventually convinces him, but a work obligation arises.
• Carly is at Roselawn and wants to come home for Christmas, but her doctors don't think she's ready. She becomes upset when Michael asks Emily to spend Christmas with him and Sonny.
• Tracy forces Dillon to move back home from college to keep an eye on Lulu.  Nikolas gives Lulu a diamond necklace for Christmas.
• Manny Ruiz, responsible for the Glencoe Tunnel crash, is recovering from brain surgery.  Alexis is appointed to defend him, despite being a victim of the crash.
• Sonny is preparing for Christmas with his sons, but Carly won't be home. Courtney offers to spend Christmas with them, but Sonny refuses if Nikolas comes along.
• Nikolas is leaving town on business but promises Courtney a special Christmas upon his return.  Jax makes a clandestine deal with a man, where money is no object.
• Robin clashes with Patrick over her concern for Manny Ruiz, accusing Patrick of lacking compassion.
</summary>

<summary>
* Gus finds out that Rafe is his son.
* Natalia reveals that she named Rafe after Gus's father.
* Beth wants space from Alan.
* Leah is upset with Beth for breaking up her family.
* Reva is drugging and kidnapping Lizzie.
* Rafe gets in trouble with a guard after finding out Gus is his father.
* Alan's check to Reva bounced, and she calls him out on it.
* Rick and Mel decide to team up to fight Alan and Beth for custody of the new baby. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Rick is struggling to host the annual Bauer barbecue on his anniversary following his break-up with Beth.
• Ava and Bill attend the barbecue, pretending to be a happy couple despite their strained relationship and the secret about their baby's paternity.
• Lizzie reveals to Remy that Ava's baby is not Bill's, leading to a confrontation between Remy and Ava.
• Alan suffers a fall at the Spaulding house and claims to feel better than ever.
• The barbecue is moved to Cassie and Josh's farm, where Rick eventually joins and Mallet gives a heartfelt speech about the meaning of the holiday. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Cassie and Jeffrey discuss attending a political dinner where Jeffrey is receiving an award, but it conflicts with RJ's party. Edmund overhears and smugly offers to supervise the party so Cassie can go with Jeffrey, but she declines.
* Dinah agrees to tell Cassie that Edmund didn't kidnap her in exchange for Edmund sleeping with her. Bill asks Dinah to participate in a family photo session with him and Olivia, but she initially refuses, feeling unworthy.
* Jonathan sets up Sandy to make Tammy believe he's cheating on her.  Sandy breaks up with Tammy, believing she doubts him too easily.  Jonathan and Sandy get into a fight with Nate and Jonathan, which Reva breaks up.
* Olivia discovers that Nate was Reva's boss and that Jonathan has been covering for Alfred. They agree to work together to bring both men to justice.
* Reva, seeking solace and a sense of belonging, asks Nate for her old job back at Company. He welcomes her back.
* The episode ends with a "Next on Guiding Light" preview featuring Lizzie, Mel, Rick, Buzz, Alan, Mallet, and Gus. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Alan Spaulding is arrested for the murder of his son, Phillip. He confesses to the crime in front of witnesses, but later tries to retract his confession.
* Alexandra Spaulding reveals that she has physical evidence linking Alan to the murder: a pair of gloves with gunshot residue and Phillip's blood on them.
* Dinah Marler reveals to Edmund Winslow that she lost their baby. She offers to have another child with him, but he still desires to be with Cassie.
* Cassie wants to find a way to co-parent with Edmund for the sake of their child, but he is still in love with her and wants to rekindle their relationship.
* Tammy Santos tries to reconcile with Sandy Foster, who is now interested in April. Jonathan Randall witnesses their interactions and makes cryptic remarks.
</summary>

<summary>
• Shayne is dealing with newfound fame after being drafted by a baseball team. He wants to go on a road trip with Marina to escape the attention.
• Marina is hiding something from Shayne and is hesitant to go on the trip.
• Ben believes Mitch Hendon attacked him after remembering a familiar aftershave scent.
• Gus suspects Ben might be faking his memory lapse and is suspicious of his motives.
• Edmund wants to surprise Cassie by restoring a farm for her and her children.
• Alexandra asks Edmund to help her with a business proposal in exchange for her help in getting rid of Jeffrey.
• Cassie kicks Jeffrey out of the hotel, and he is forced to find a new place to live.
• Eden tries to convince Gus of her innocence, but he believes she has a motive for the murders.
• Tony believes Eden and offers to help her clear her name.
• Mitch Hendon is cornered on the roof of the Beacon.
</summary>

<summary>
* Cyrus, with the help of Griggs, is secretly stealing donations from the Spaulding charity event by relaying account and routing numbers from checks to Griggs via a hidden receiver. 
* Marina discovers Cyrus' scheme and reveals that she has been aware of his actions, even feeding him her own bank account numbers to expose him. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Shayne is struggling with the aftereffects of injuries sustained while clearing landmines and is pushing away his family's attempts to help.
* Reva is worried about Shayne but also trying to focus on her high-risk pregnancy and finds support in a doula.
* Remy is still grieving the loss of his wife, Ava, and their baby, Max, and is hesitant to move on.
* Beth is drawn to Coop and considers a romantic relationship with him, despite the complications it would bring.
* Buzz warns Coop about the dangers of getting involved with Beth, given her history with Alan.
* Alan is trying to convince Beth to go to China with him for business, while Lizzie is determined to stay and help Bill clear his name.
* Bill encourages Lizzie to go to China for the sake of their business deal, promising that he will continue to investigate the kidnapping case. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Todd questions Blair's early return from her trip with Sam, suspecting Shawna's involvement. Blair eventually confesses her love for Todd and forgives him for past wrongdoings.

• Roxy discovers Max and Asa's scheme to manipulate her into a divorce. Max has a change of heart and declares his desire to stay married, but Roxy ultimately decides to leave him.

• Asa attempts to finalize his divorce from Rae, but she reveals altered divorce papers giving her the majority of his fortune.

• Liz plans to leave Llanview after her baby is born, causing conflict with R.J. and Antonio. Antonio vows to tell Keri the truth about the baby's paternity.

• Keri experiences pregnancy complications but is reassured by a sonogram. R.J. and Antonio clash over Liz's plans.
